clinical_study.brief_title: Testing How Well Magnesium Citrate Capsules Work as Preparation for a Colonoscopy
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Magnesium Citrate Capsules in Colonoscopy Preparation: A Randomized, Investigator-blinded Non-inferiority Trial Using Polyethylene Glycol as the Active Control.

brief_summary.textblock: This study compares a colonoscopy preparation composed of magnesium citrate capsules to a preparation of polyethylene glycol solution. The hypothesis is that the magnesium citrate capsules work as well and are better liked by patients due to the lack of taste.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: One arm receives Polyethelyne Glycol colonoscopy preparation and the other arm receives magnesium citrate capsules colonoscopy preparation.
study_design_info.masking_description: The endoscopist who reports colon cleanliness is blinded to the subject's assignment.

primary_outcome.description: Boston scale rating of colon cleanliness

secondary_outcome.description: Patient's experience recorded in a questionnaire

intervention.description: 4 liters of Polyethylene Glycol for colonoscopy preparation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- • Scheduled for colonoscopy at Sinai Hospital or Woodholme GI Associates
Exclusion Criteria:
- • Calculated creatinine clearance under 30ml/min
- On PPI and unable to stop for five days before colonoscopy
- On H2 blockers and unable to stop for two days before colonoscopy
- achlorhydria
- Previous colon surgery
- Cardiovascular disease, including uncontrolled congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, or recent (3 months) percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty, myocardial infarction, or coronary artery bypass graft surgery
- Colon disease, including chronic constipation (<2 bowel movements per week for >1 year), ileus and/or acute obstruction, ileostomy, right or transverse colostomy, subtotal colectomy (≥50% of colon removed) with ileosigmoidostomy, hypomotility syndrome, megacolon, or idiopathic pseudo-obstruction
- Pregnant women
